contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 7, 1922 D St Ives Contest (Section 2)
St Ives Contest (Section 2) 2 Test Piece Contest St Ives Contest st-ives-contest-section-2
None
St. Ives, Cornwall Prizes - 1st £18 and cup. 2nd £13, 3rd £10. Best horn and cornet - Bugle. Best euphonium and trombone - Redruth. March contest - 1st Newquay, 2nd Truro, 3rd Bugle 4 bands competed
Aug. 31, 2013, 1:34 p.m. Feb. 12, 2021, 2:26 p.m.
1 Newquay Band George Cave
2 Bugle Silver Band Edwin J. Williams Snr
3 Truro City Tom Hubbard
4 Redruth Town F. H. Venton
